title: Textile, ca. 1850–1899
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; glazed
description: Cotton, printed, probably by roller, in small all-over pattern of pink morning glories and leaves. The green is the chemical or "direct" green. Glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1850–1899.
ca. 1850–1899. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; glazed. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1967-20-30.
